articles.author: Reuters
articles.title: Reliance buys its first Canadian crude from Trans Mountain pipeline, sources say | Mint - Mint
articles.description: Reliance joins a growing group of Asian refiners in buying Canadian crude to be exported from the new pipeline which is scheduled to start transporting oil in May. The Canadian government-owned pipeline expansion will nearly triple the flow of crude from Albe…
articles.content: Reliance Industries has bought 2 million barrels of Canadian crude from Shell for July delivery, marking the Indian refiner's first oil purchase from Canada's new Trans Mountain pipeline, trade sourc… [+2232 chars]
